comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: A dancer of the Ballett Russe (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ballets_Russes) A photograph of her is in The sun., November 07, 1915, FOURTH SECTION PICTORIAL MAGAZINE, Image 35 According to catalogue.bnf.fr/servlet/autorite?ID=14847077&idNoeud..., she was Lubov Tchernicheva (1890-1976)
